long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture your screen then edit and create JIRA tickets quickly.
Take screenshots and draw arrows/circles/text etc.

Empower your internal teams with the User Acceptance Testing & Feedback Collection extension for Atlassian Ecosystem. Create JIRA issues with screenshots, leave feedback, and add comments directly from any webpage, all without leaving your browser. No third-party services required — your data stays secure and private, stored directly on your browser. 

🌟 Why use UATIFY? 🌟

🔒 Zero permissions required!
💡 Super easy to start using; it’s perfect for non-technical teams.
⚡ Give and receive fast feedback about UX/UI directly from web pages.
⏰ Save time on task descriptions and making screenshots.
🔐 Super secure because all your data stays directly in your browser and is shared only with JIRA.

Key Features:

- Create JIRA issues with Screenshots: Instantly capture and attach screenshots to JIRA issues directly from any webpage.
- Easily blur sensitive info in screenshots.
- Edit screenshots
- Leave Feedback and Comments: Add detailed feedback and comments to JIRA issues without navigating away from your current page.
- Seamless JIRA Integration: Connect with your JIRA account directly through your browser, ensuring a smooth and efficient user experience.
- Data Security: All your data is stored locally on your browser, ensuring maximum privacy and security.
